data.message: Eminem eminem dear , I live in the last city in Brazil , I can not go to your showw and many people also not . We are very happy that u is step on the soil of our country for the second time . Most do not know to describe the feeling that this feeling in power know this, but the MAJORITY is very upset with you that we will not be able to see you in your show. And you upset us, why will not let be displayed her show on TV or internet , if u podesse back on this decision please dear shady.
